remarks: Two ways to say that a meet is defined.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Sep-2018.)
statement:
meetdef.u $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
meetdef.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
meetdef.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
meetdef.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. W ) $.
meetdef.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. Z ) $.
meetdef $p |- ( ph -> ( <. X , Y >. e. dom ./\ <-> { X , Y } e. dom G ) ) $.
